flawed_nl_solution:
Mr. Llesis kept 50 x 7/10 = <<50*7/10=500/7>>500/7 kilograms of rice.
So, he gave 50 - 500/7 = <<50-500/7=-150/7>>-150/7 kilograms of rice to Mr. Everest.
Therefore, Mr. Llesis kept 500/7 - -150/7 = <<500/7--150/7=650/7>>650/7 kilograms more than Mr. Everest.
#### 650/7

error_details.explanation: The result of this computation should be 35, not 500/7. It appears the value was multiplied by the reciprocal of the intended fraction.
